# morpheus_workflow (Data Source)

Provides a Morpheus workflow data source.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "morpheus_workflow" "example_workflow" {
  name = "Example Workflow"
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `name` (String) The name of the workflow

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) The ID of this resource.
